  • Changelog

    Merging of normalized bigWig files.

    merge_norm_bw.Rd

    Performs merging of normalized bigWig files, which are normally replicates.

    merge_norm_bw(are_R_objects = FALSE, rep1, rep2, merged_samples_label, out_dir)

    Arguments

    are_R_objects

    a logical indicating whether the inputs are bigWig files or R objects.

    rep1

    a character string specifying the first bigWig file or R object to be merged. Usually the first replicate.

    rep2

    a character string specifying the second bigWig file or R object to be merged. Usually the second replicate.

    merged_samples_label

    a character string specifying the filename of the merged bigWig file.

    out_dir

    a character string specifying the output directory for the merged bigWig file.

    Value

    a single merged bigWig file.

    Details

    Title

    Examples

    merge_norm_bw(are_R_objects = TRUE,
              rep1 = system.file("extdata/data","PA_1.rda", package = "ChIPbinner"),
              rep2 = system.file("extdata/data","PA_2.rda", package = "ChIPbinner"),
              merged_samples_label = "merged_PA",
              out_dir = system.file("extdata",package = "ChIPbinner"))
